desc: This lab course is highly recommended to enhance the study of biochemistry and as preparation for further research in biochemistry and related fields. The course focuses on the isolation, purification, and characterization of proteins, DNA, and RNA with particular emphasis on enzyme kinetics. The course aims to provide continuity in experimentation that is investigative in nature. Emphasis is placed on the collection, interpretation, and presentation of data. Prerequisite: previous or concurrent registration in Chemistry 379. P/N only. Offered both semesters.
name: Experimental Biochem
title: Experimental Biochemistry
